### Question 1
```{r}
data <- airquality
clean_data <- data %>% drop_na() # remove na rows
```

### Question 2
```{r}
# Temperature
# find mean, sd, min and Max of the temperature column
meanTemp <- mean(clean_data$Temp) 
meanTemp
sdTemp<- sd(clean_data$Temp)
sdTemp
minTemp <- min(clean_data$Temp)
minTemp
maxTemp <- max(clean_data$Temp)
maxTemp


# Ozone
# find mean, sd, min and Max of the ozone column
meanOzone <- mean(clean_data$Ozone)
meanOzone
sdOzone <- sd(clean_data$Ozone)
sdOzone
minOzone <- min(clean_data$Ozone)
minOzone
maxOzone <- max(clean_data$Ozone)
maxOzone

```

### Question 3
```{r}
data2<- cars #load cars data set
Y <- data2$dist
X <- cbind(1, data2$speed)
beta_hat <- solve(t(X) %*% X) %*% t(X) %*% Y # beta estimate
rownames(beta_hat) <- c("Intercept", "Speed")
beta_hat
```

### Question 4
```{r}
lm(Y~X) #check against lm function
```
